required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of Two Trivalent Influenza Vaccines Evaluated in Children and Adolescents 4 to 17 Years of Age
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase III, Observer Blind, Randomized, Controlled, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Safety of a Trivalent Subunit Influenza Vaccine Produced Either in Mammalian Cell Culture or in Embryonated Chicken Eggs (Fluvirin®), in Healthy Children and Adolescents 4 to 17 Years of Age.

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate safety and tolerability of TIVa or TIVb vaccine in healthy children and adolescents 4 to 17 years of age.

primary_outcome.measure: Number Of Subjects Reporting Solicited Local and Systemic Adverse Events and Other Indicators Of Reactogenicity After Any Vaccination.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 to Day 7 after any vaccination
primary_outcome.description: Safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported solicited local and systemic adverse events and other indicators of reactogenicity following two doses of either mammalian cell culture-derived or egg-derived trivalent influenza vaccination in subjects aged ≥4 To ≤17 Years.

primary_outcome.measure: Number Of Subjects Reporting Unsolicited Adverse Events After Any Vaccination.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 to Day49 for subjects aged ≥4 To ≤8 years not previously vaccinated. Day 1 to Day 38 for subjects aged ≥4 To ≤8 years previously vaccinated and all subjects aged ≥9 To ≤17 years.
primary_outcome.description: Safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported unsolicited adverse events following vaccination with either mammalian cell culture-derived or egg-derived trivalent influenza vaccination in subjects aged ≥4 To ≤17 Years.

primary_outcome.measure: Number Of Subjects Reporting Unsolicited Serious Adverse Events After Any Vaccination.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 to Day 183 for previously vaccinated subjects and Day 213 for not-previously vaccinated subjects
primary_outcome.description: Safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported serious adverse events (SAEs), medically attended AEs and new onset of chronic diseases (NOCD) in subjects aged ≥4 To ≤17 Years.

arm_group.description: Subjects ≥4 to ≤17 years of age received one or two doses of mammalian cell-culture-derived trivalent influenza vaccine based on their previous vaccination status.
Subjects ≥4 to ≤17 years of age received one or two doses of egg-derived trivalent influenza vaccine based on their previous vaccination status.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy subjects 4-17 years of age
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who are not healthy,
- Subjects who are pregnant or breast feeding,
- Subjects with a history of severe allergic reaction or allergic to any of the vaccine components.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Subjects were enrolled at a total of 34 centers in 5 countries: 18 sites in the US, 6 sites in Australia, 2 sites in New Zealand, 5 sites in the Philippines and 3 sites in Thailand.

group.title: TIVc
group.description: Subjects ≥4 to ≤17 years of age received one or two doses of mammalian cell-culture-derived trivalent influenza vaccine based on their previous vaccination status.

group.title: TIVf
group.description: Subjects ≥4 to ≤17 years of age received one or two doses of egg-derived trivalent influenza vaccine based on their previous vaccination status.

group.title: TOTAL
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Number Of Subjects Reporting Solicited Local and Systemic Adverse Events and Other Indicators Of Reactogenicity After Any Vaccination.
outcome.description: Safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported solicited local and systemic adverse events and other indicators of reactogenicity following two doses of either mammalian cell culture-derived or egg-derived trivalent influenza vaccination in subjects aged ≥4 To ≤17 Years.
outcome.time_frame: Day 1 to Day 7 after any vaccination
outcome.population: Analysis was done on the solicited safety dataset, i.e. the subjects in the exposed population who provided postvaccination solicited safety data.

reported_events.time_frame: 6 months for subjects aged ≥4 to ≤8 years previously vaccinated and all subjects aged ≥9 to ≤17 Years 7 months for subjects aged ≥4 to ≤8 years not previously vaccinated.
reported_events.desc: For subjects aged ≥4 to ≤8 years not previously vaccinated AEs collected from day 1 to 7 and day 29 to 35. SAEs, medically attended AEs and NOCD till day 213 For subjects aged ≥4 to ≤8 years previously vaccinated and subjects aged ≥9 to ≤17 Years AEs were collected from day 1 to 7. SAEs, medically attended AEs and NOCD were collected till day 183

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
